dcterms:description: THUMOS14 contains 200 videos in the training set and 213 videos in the testing set for the task of action localization, featuring 20 action categories. The videos have an average of 15 action instances per video with an average of 8% overlapping instances.
dcterms:title: THUMOS14

dcterms:description: Charades is a large-scale dataset containing 9848 videos of daily indoor activities, featuring 157 action categories. The videos contain an average of 6 action instances per video with an average of 79% overlapping instances.
dcterms:title: Charades

dcterms:description: EPIC-Kitchens100 contains 700 egocentric videos of daily kitchen activities, featuring 289 noun and 97 verb classes. The videos contain an average of 128 action instances per video with an average of 28% overlapping instances.
dcterms:title: EPIC-Kitchens100
